articles.title: Scientists revived a worm that was frozen in permafrost for 46,000 years - BGR
articles.description: A worm that was previously frozen in permafrost has been revived after being frozen for over 46,000 years.
articles.content: The Siberian permafrost continues to illicit new mysteries for scientists to dig into, especially as it begins to thaw more and more. The latest discovery comes with the revival of a worm that has re… [+2054 chars]

articles.author: Chad Langen
articles.title: Scientists Are Making Mr. Freeze's Iconic Weapon A Reality - Giant Freakin Robot
articles.description: There's a practical reason for researchers to be developing freeze gun technology that has nothing to do with holding Gotham for ransom.
